data.message: Hello Facebook please get rid of everything that has to do with Messenger. It has been totally hacked and is unsafe to use and it is the only way to send a personal message to someone through facebook. Please create a new safer messaging platform to use. Thank you.

replies.message: Sorry to hear you feel that way, Ann. We're constantly working to improve our communities' experience with our products. If you have any additional suggestions you'd like to share, please visit: http://bit.ly/2z9t5mh. -Stephanie
